department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: National Master Standing Offers for aviation fuels, delivery to various locations in Canada
description: The tender is seeking a contract for National Master Standing Offers for aviation fuels.
duration_in_months: There seems to have been an error.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement**

### Introduction

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites interested suppliers to submit a bid for the procurement of national master standing offers for aviation fuels (into-plane) in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards. The tender is open to all interested suppliers.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is covered under the following trade agreements: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement.

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: PW-__HL-654-81412
* **Solicitation Number**: E60HL-220050/E
* **Publication Date**: September 30, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 18, 2022, 2:00 PM
* **Region of Delivery**: Nova Scotia
* **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **End User**: Public Works and Government Services Canada

### Tender Content

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Interested suppliers may submit a bid, and competitive procurement strategy is based on lowest/lower bid. The tender includes the delivery of various quantities of aviation fuels (into-plane) to various locations in Canada on an as-and-when-requested basis from November 1, 2022, to May 31, 2024.

### How to Respond

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Interested suppliers must submit their bid documents to the following contact:

* **Contact Person**: Bobbi MacLeod
* **Email**: [bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:bobbi.macleod@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (873) 354-1451

### Support

A request for proposal (RFP) document is available on the Canadabuys website. The bid submission deadline is October 18, 2022, at 2:00 PM. Late bids will not be accepted. Thank you for your interest in this opportunity. [1]

[1] The request for proposal document is available at the following URL: https
